objects.__Set__synopsis_long: Desde que Quentin Tarantino invadiu a cena cinematográfica com Reservoir Dogs em 1992, o termo "tarantinoesco", tanto elogio quanto pejorativo, enraizou-se firmemente no léxico da cultura pop. Ele descreve um modo de filmagem dirigido pelo ego, apresentando violência hiper-estilizada, diálogo duro e gamey, mas melodioso, histórias díspares que se juntam de alguma forma (geralmente através de edição levemente vanguardista) e zooms de colisão.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Set__synopsis_long: Ever since Quentin Tarantino broke into the movie scene with Reservoir Dogs in 1992, the term "Tarantinoesque," both compliment and pejorative, has firmly entrenched itself in the pop culture lexicon. It describes an ego-driven mode of filmmaking, featuring hyper-stylized violence, tough and gamey yet melodious dialogue, disparate storylines that come together in some way (usually via lightly avant-garde editing), and crash zooms.

objects.__Episode__title: GOT S05E4 - Sons of the Harpy

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Cersei authorizes arming the Sparrows as the Faith Militant, who then arrest Loras Tyrell for homosexuality. Queen Margaery is enraged, but Tommen proves too weak to countermand them. Melisandre attempts to seduce Jon as a means to convince him to accompany Stannis to Winterfell. In Winterfell, before Littlefinger heads to King's Landing, he dispels Sansa's misgivings about marrying Ramsay, promising that Stannis will defeat the Boltons and rescue her, and even if not, she can manipulate Ramsay. Bronn and Jaime secretly land in Dorne to retrieve Myrcella; hearing this, Ellaria and her Sand Snakes plot to avenge Oberyn's death by abducting Myrcella. Jorah intends to redeem himself to Daenerys by presenting Tyrion as a prisoner. In Meereen, Loraq again appeals to Daenerys to reopen the fighting pits, a local tradition; the Sons of the Harpy ambush an Unsullied patrol inside the citadel, critically wounding Grey Worm and killing Ser Barristan Selmy.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Jorah Mormont sets sail alongside his prisoner, Tyrion. Cersei makes a move against the Tyrells. Jaime and Bronn sneak into Dorne. Ellaria and the Sand Snakes make their plans. Melisandre tempts Jon. The Harpies attack.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S05E4 - Sons of the Harpy

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Ainda em fuga, Nacho é forçado a escolher onde está sua lealdade. Saul deve decidir se quer permanecer um "amigo do cartel" depois que sua reputação for questionada. Gus e Mike preparam a equipe para um encontro.
objects.__Episode__title: BCS S06E03 - Rock and Hard Place
objects.__Episode__title_short: Entre a cruz e a espada

objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Still on the run, Nacho is forced to choose where his loyalties lie. Saul must decide whether he wants to remain a "friend of the cartel" after his reputation is called into question. Gus and Mike ready the team for a meet.
objects.__Episode__title: BCS S06E03 - Rock and Hard Place

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Em Porto Real, Tywin coage Olenna a um acordo para casar Cersei com Loras. Cersei admite a Tyrion que Joffrey tentou matá-lo durante o cerco. Tyrion informa Shae e Sansa sobre seu noivado e Sansa. Mindinho diz a Varys que descobriu que Ros era a informante de Varys e que Joffrey a matou. Nas Terras Fluviais, Melisandre compra Gendry da Irmandade e prediz Arya que ela matará muitas pessoas com olhos castanhos, olhos verdes e olhos azuis; ela promete que eles vão se encontrar novamente. Tendo se casado com Talisa, Robb faz um novo acordo com Walder Frey, dando-lhe Harrenhal e fazendo com que seu tio, Edmure Tully, se case com uma filha ou neta de Frey. Roose Bolton planeja enviar Jaime para Porto Real, mas se recusa a permitir que Brienne o acompanhe. Em um local desconhecido, o homem misterioso continua torturando Theon. No Norte, surge a tensão entre Osha e Meera. Além da Muralha, Sam continua seu vôo com Gilly, enquanto Jon e Ygritte escalam a Muralha com outros dois Selvagens.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Jon e os selvagens escalam a Muralha. A Irmandade vende Gendry para Melisandre. Robb faz o que pode para reconquistar os Freys. Tyrion conta a Sansa sobre o noivado.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: In King's Landing, Tywin coerces Olenna into an agreement to marry Cersei to Loras. Cersei admits to Tyrion that Joffrey tried to have him killed during the siege. Tyrion informs Shae and Sansa about his and Sansa's betrothal. Littlefinger tells Varys that he discovered Ros was Varys' informant and that Joffrey killed her. In the Riverlands, Melisandre buys Gendry from the Brotherhood, and foretells Arya that she will kill many people with brown eyes, green eyes, and blue eyes; she promises they will meet again. Having married Talisa, Robb strikes a new agreement with Walder Frey by giving him Harrenhal and having his uncle, Edmure Tully, marry a Frey daughter or granddaughter. Roose Bolton plans to send Jaime to King's Landing, but refuses to allow Brienne to accompany him. At an unknown location, the mysterious man continues torturing Theon. In the North, tension arises between Osha and Meera. Beyond the Wall, Sam continues his flight with Gilly, while Jon and Ygritte scale the Wall with two other Wildlings.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Jon and the wildlings scale the Wall. The Brotherhood sells Gendry to Melisandre. Robb does what he can to win back the Freys. Tyrion tells Sansa about their engagement.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Um visitante inesperado força Jimmy e Kim a enfrentar as consequências de suas ações.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: An unexpected visitor forces Jimmy and Kim to face the consequences of their actions.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Roose Bolton retorna ao Forte do Pavor com sua noiva, uma das filhas de Walder Frey. Ele castiga Ramsay por torturar e castrar Theon, desvalorizando-o como refém. Theon, que se degenerou em uma persona subserviente chamada 'Reek', revela que Bran e Rickon Stark estão vivos e ameaçam a legitimidade de Roose como Protetor do Norte. Roose ordena que Ramsay recupere os territórios sob ocupação Ironborn, prometendo uma recompensa se ele conseguir. Em Pedra do Dragão, Melisandre sacrifica três pessoas, incluindo o cunhado de Stannis, queimando-os até a morte como um tributo ao Senhor da Luz, encantando a Rainha Selyse e nojento Sor Davos e a Princesa Shireen. Para proteger Shae de sua família, Tyrion consegue mandá-la para Pentos em Essos, deixando-a angustiada. Bronn treina Jaime na esgrima com a mão esquerda. Rei Joffrey e Margaery Tyrell estão casados. Durante a festa do Casamento Real, Joffrey humilha Tyrion e insulta Sansa pouco antes de Joffrey sucumbir fatalmente ao vinho envenenado. Uma Cersei perturbada prende Tyrion por seu assassinato, enquanto Sor Dontos, um ex-cavaleiro, convence Sansa a deixar o banquete com ele para sua proteção.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: O casamento de Joffrey e Margaery chegou. Tyrion termina com Shae. Ramsay tenta provar seu valor para seu pai. Bran e companhia encontram uma árvore Weirwood.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S04E2 - The Lion and the Rose

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Roose Bolton returns to the Dreadfort with his bride, one of Walder Frey's daughters. He chastises Ramsay for torturing and castrating Theon, devaluing him as a hostage. Theon, who has degenerated into a subservient persona called 'Reek', discloses that Bran and Rickon Stark are alive and threaten Roose's legitimacy as Warden of the North. Roose orders Ramsay to reclaim the territories under Ironborn occupation, promising a reward if he succeeds. In Dragonstone, Melisandre sacrifices three people, including Stannis' brother-in-law, burning them to death as a tribute to the Lord of Light, delighting Queen Selyse and disgusting Ser Davos and Princess Shireen. To protect Shae from his family, Tyrion arranges to send her to Pentos on Essos, leaving her distressed. Bronn coaches Jaime in left-handed swordplay. King Joffrey and Margaery Tyrell are wed. During the Royal Wedding feast, Joffrey humiliates Tyrion and taunts Sansa just before Joffrey fatally succumbs to poisoned wine. A distraught Cersei has Tyrion arrested for his murder, while Ser Dontos, a former knight, persuades Sansa to leave the feast with him for her protection.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Joffrey and Margaery's wedding has come. Tyrion breaks up with Shae. Ramsay tries to prove his worth to his father. Bran and company find a Weirwood tree.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S04E2 - The Lion and the Rose

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__title: GOT S05E1 - The Wars to Come

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: In a flashback, a witch foretells a teenage Cersei that she will one day be a queen until a younger and more beautiful queen usurps her. The witch also predicts Cersei will have three children and her king husband will have twenty. In the present, Tywin is buried, and Lancel Lannister returns, now a devoted convert of a fanatical religious cult called the "Sparrows". In Pentos on Essos, a despondent Tyrion accompanies Varys to Meereen to meet Daenerys, who Varys believes may be worthy of the Iron Throne. In Meereen, the insurgent "Sons of the Harpy" murder an Unsullied. Daenerys angrily resists restoring old local traditions, including reopening the fighting pits. Missandei asks Grey Worm about why some Unsullied visit brothels. Daenerys visits her two confined dragons, who act aggressively toward her. In the Vale, Littlefinger puts Robin in House Royce's care when he and Sansa depart. At the Wall, Stannis Baratheon seeks to recruit the Wildlings in his war against Roose Bolton, offering citizenship and land as a reward. Jon is unable to persuade Mance Rayder to "bend the knee" to Stannis. As Mance is burned alive, Jon ends his agony with an arrow to the heart.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Cersei and Jaime adjust to a world without Tywin. Tyrion and Varys arrive at Pentos. In Meereen, a new enemy emerges. Jon is caught between two kings.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S05E1 - The Wars to Come

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Catelyn tenta unir os irmãos Baratheon contra os Lannisters, mas Stannis exige a lealdade de Renly a ele como rei. Mindinho visita Catelyn e se oferece para trocar Jaime por suas filhas. Davos testemunha Melisandre dando à luz uma criatura das sombras. Joffrey abusa publicamente de Sansa como vingança pelas vitórias de Robb até que Tyrion intervém. O anão envia duas prostitutas ao jovem rei para acalmar seus ânimos, mas Joffrey faz uma delas bater na outra brutalmente, ameaçando Tyrion de não interferir em seus negócios. Tyrion libera Pycelle e o dispensa do Pequeno Conselho. Quando Tyrion descobre o relacionamento incestuoso de Cersei com seu primo, Lancel, ele chantageia Lancel para espionar Cersei, ameaçando revelar o relacionamento a Joffrey. Arya e Gendry são levados para o castelo de Harrenhal como cativos. Os prisioneiros são sistematicamente torturados até a morte até que Tywin chegue e exija que sejam usados ​​como mão de obra. Reconhecendo que Arya é uma garota, ele a torna sua serva sem saber sua verdadeira identidade. Depois de uma jornada exaustiva pelo deserto, Daenerys chega à próspera cidade de Qarth. Daxos, um membro do Conselho dos Treze, convence seus colegas vereadores a permitir que Daenerys e sua comitiva entrem na cidade.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Lord Baelish chega ao acampamento de Renly pouco antes de enfrentar Stannis. Daenerys e sua companhia são recebidos na cidade de Qarth. Arya, Gendry e Torta Quente se encontram presos em Harrenhal.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Catelyn attempts to unite the Baratheon brothers against the Lannisters, but Stannis demands Renly's loyalty to him as king. Littlefinger visits Catelyn and offers to trade Jaime for her daughters. Davos witnesses Melisandre giving birth to a shadow creature. Joffrey publicly abuses Sansa as revenge for Robb's victories until Tyrion intervenes. The dwarf sends two prostitutes to the young King to calm his tempers, but Joffrey makes one of them beat the other brutally, thus threatening Tyrion not to interfere with his business. Tyrion releases Pycelle and dismisses him from the Small Council. When Tyrion discovers Cersei's incestuous relationship with their cousin, Lancel, he blackmails Lancel into spying on Cersei, threatening to reveal the relationship to Joffrey. Arya and Gendry are taken to Harrenhal castle as captives. Prisoners are systematically tortured to death until Tywin arrives and demands they be used as labor. Recognizing Arya is a girl, he makes her his servant without knowing her true identity. After an exhausting journey through the desert, Daenerys arrives at the prosperous city of Qarth. Daxos, a member of the Council of Thirteen, persuades fellow councilmen to allow Daenerys and her retinue to enter the city.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Lord Baelish arrives at Renly's camp just before he faces off against Stannis. Daenerys and her company are welcomed into the city of Qarth. Arya, Gendry, and Hot Pie find themselves imprisoned at Harrenhal.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: O espião eunuco do rei Robert, Varys, descobriu que Daenerys Targaryen está grávida. Ned rejeita o plano de Robert de assassiná-la, considerando que Daenerys não é uma ameaça. Ele renuncia em protesto como Mão de Robert, irritando o rei. Catelyn e seu prisioneiro, Tyrion, chegam à fortaleza de sua irmã Lysa Arryn no Ninho da Águia. As notícias da captura de Tyrion chegam a Porto Real, onde Jaime Lannister, irmão gêmeo da rainha, exige respostas de Ned. Um Jaime vingativo ordena que os homens de Ned sejam mortos e luta contra Ned até que o homem de Jaime esfaqueia Ned na perna por trás, deixando-o ferido.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Catelyn capturou Tyrion e planeja trazê-lo para sua irmã, Lysa Arryn, no Vale, para ser julgado por seus supostos crimes contra Bran. Robert planeja matar Daenerys, mas Eddard se recusa a fazer parte disso e desiste.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S01E5 - The Wolf and the Lion

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: King Robert's eunuch spy, Varys, has uncovered that Daenerys Targaryen is pregnant. Ned rejects Robert's plan to assassinate her, considering Daenerys a non-threat. He resigns in protest as Robert's Hand, angering the king. Catelyn and her prisoner, Tyrion, arrive at her sister Lysa Arryn's fortress home in the Eyrie. News of Tyrion's capture reaches King's Landing where Jaime Lannister, the Queen's twin brother, demands answers from Ned. A vengeful Jaime orders Ned's men killed and fights Ned until Jaime's man stabs Ned in the leg from behind, leaving him wounded.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Catelyn has captured Tyrion and plans to bring him to her sister, Lysa Arryn, at the Vale, to be tried for his, supposed, crimes against Bran. Robert plans to have Daenerys killed, but Eddard refuses to be a part of it and quits.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S01E5 - The Wolf and the Lion

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Em Essos, Davos e Stannis se encontram com o Banco de Ferro para garantir um empréstimo para Stannis. Davos reencontra Salladhor Saan e seus piratas. Em Meereen, Daenerys se adapta ao seu novo papel como rainha, ouvindo os intermináveis ​​pedidos de seus súditos, incluindo o nobre Hizdahr zo Loraq, que deseja recuperar o corpo de seu pai crucificado, e um camponês cujas cabras foram mortas pelos dragões cada vez mais incontroláveis ​​de Daenerys. No Forte do Pavor, Yara lidera uma missão para resgatar Theon, que, emocionalmente quebrado, se recusa a sair, forçando Yara a abandoná-lo. Ramsay recompensa a obediência de Theon e, planejando tomar Fosso Cailin, encarrega "Reek" de se passar por "Theon Greyjoy". Em Porto Real, Tywin coloca uma recompensa pela cabeça do Cão de Caça e instrui Varys a continuar espionando Daenerys. Tyrion é julgado pelo assassinato de Joffrey. Todas as testemunhas testemunham contra ele, incluindo Sor Meryn Trant, Grande Meistre Pycelle, Cersei e Varys, que dão depoimentos convincentes, embora circunstanciais. Para o choque de Tyrion, Shae testemunha falsamente contra ele. Tyrion proclama sua inocência e exige um julgamento por combate.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: O julgamento de Tyrion chegou. Yara e suas tropas invadem o Forte do Pavor para libertar Theon. Daenerys conhece Hizdar zo Loraq. Stannis faz um acordo com o Banco de Ferro de Bravos.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S04E6 - The Laws of Gods and Men
objects.__Episode__title_short: As Leis dos Deuses e dos Homens

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: In Essos, Davos and Stannis meet with the Iron Bank to secure a loan for Stannis. Davos re-engages Salladhor Saan and his pirates. In Meereen, Daenerys adapts to her new role as queen, hearing her subjects' endless requests, including nobleman Hizdahr zo Loraq who wishes to reclaim his crucified father's body, and a peasant man whose goats were killed by Daenerys' increasingly uncontrollable dragons. In the Dreadfort, Yara leads a mission to rescue Theon, who, emotionally broken, refuses to leave, forcing Yara to abandon him. Ramsay rewards Theon's obedience and, planning to take Moat Cailin, tasks "Reek" to impersonate "Theon Greyjoy". In King's Landing, Tywin puts a bounty on the Hound's head and instructs Varys to continue spying on Daenerys. Tyrion is tried for Joffrey's murder. All the witnesses testify against him, including Ser Meryn Trant, Grand Maester Pycelle, Cersei, and Varys, who give compelling, though circumstantial, testimony. To Tyrion's shock, Shae falsely testifies against him. Tyrion proclaims his innocence and demands a trial by combat.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Tyrion's trial has come. Yara and her troops storm the Dreadfort to free Theon. Daenerys meets Hizdar zo Loraq. Stannis makes a deal with the Iron Bank of Braavos.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S04E6 - The Laws of Gods and Men
objects.__Episode__title_short: The Laws of Gods and Men

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Daenerys captura facilmente Meereen, auxiliada por uma revolta de escravos. Buscando justiça para 163 crianças escravas mortas, ela prega 163 senhores nos mesmos postes da estrada. No mar, Mindinho revela sua cumplicidade na morte de Joffrey para Sansa. Antes de sair de Porto Real, Olenna sugere a Margaery que ela envenenou Joffrey. Ela pede que Margaery se case com Tommen antes que Cersei possa colocá-lo contra ela. Jaime acredita que Tyrion é inocente, mas Cersei está convencida de que ele é culpado e também ordena que Jaime localize e mate Sansa como cúmplice. Jaime, em vez disso, envia Brienne para encontrar e proteger Sansa, apresentando-lhe uma nova armadura, sua espada valiriana, que ela chama de Guardiã do Juramento, cavalos e um escudeiro, Podrick Payne, ex-servo de Tyrion. No Norte, na esperança de eliminar Jon, Alliser Thorne e Janos Slynt concordam em permitir que Jon lidere a expedição contra os amotinados. Sem que Jon saiba, os amotinados capturaram Bran e seus companheiros. Mais ao norte, um White Walker leva o último filho recém-nascido de Craster para um local de ritual secreto onde ele é transformado em um Walker.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Jaime confia uma tarefa a Brienne. Daenerys liberta Meereen. Jon recebe permissão para liderar um grupo de Vigilantes da Noite para a Fortaleza de Craster. Bran e companhia são feitos reféns.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Daenerys easily captures Meereen, assisted by a slave revolt. Seeking justice for 163 slain slave children, she nails 163 masters to the same road posts. At sea, Littlefinger reveals his complicity in Joffrey's death to Sansa. Before leaving King's Landing, Olenna implies to Margaery that she poisoned Joffrey. She urges Margaery to marry Tommen before Cersei can turn him against her. Jaime believes Tyrion is innocent, but Cersei is adamant he is guilty and also orders Jaime to locate and kill Sansa as an accomplice. Jaime instead sends Brienne to find and protect Sansa, presenting her with new armor, his Valyrian sword, which she names Oath Keeper, horses and a squire, Podrick Payne, Tyrion's former servant. In the North, hoping to eliminate Jon, Alliser Thorne and Janos Slynt agree to allow Jon to lead the expedition against the mutineers. Unknown to Jon, the mutineers have captured Bran and his companions. Further north, a White Walker takes Craster's last newborn son to a secret ritual site where he is transformed into a Walker.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Jaime entrusts a task to Brienne. Daenerys frees Meereen. Jon is given permission to lead a group of Night's Watchmen to Craster's Keep. Bran and company are taken hostage.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Ned participa do Pequeno Conselho do Rei e descobre que Westeros foi mal administrado e está profundamente endividado. Catelyn viaja para Porto Real para avisar secretamente seu marido sobre a tentativa de assassinato, mas ela é interceptada por seu amigo de infância, o conselheiro Petyr "Mindinho" Baelish. Bran descobre que nunca mais vai andar e continua incapaz de se lembrar dos eventos que levaram à sua queda. Jon luta para se adaptar à vida na Muralha. A outrora elite Patrulha da Noite agora recruta muitos criminosos de baixo nascimento e/ou condenados que não se impressionam com a linhagem de Jon. O Senhor Comandante Mormont pede a Tyrion que implore ao Rei que envie mais recrutas para a Patrulha da Noite. Daenerys, agora grávida, enfrenta seu irmão, Viserys, ameaçando-o se ele abusar dela novamente.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Jon começa seu treinamento com a Patrulha da Noite; Ned confronta seu passado e futuro em Porto Real; Daenerys se vê em desacordo com Viserys.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Ned attends the King's Small Council and learns Westeros has been poorly managed and is deeply in debt. Catelyn travels to King's Landing to covertly warn her husband about the assassination attempt, but she is intercepted by her childhood friend, Councillor Petyr "Littlefinger" Baelish. Bran learns he will never walk again and remains unable to remember the events leading to his fall. Jon struggles to adapt to life on the Wall. The once elite Night's Watch now recruits many low-born and/or convicted criminals who are unimpressed by Jon's bloodline. Lord Commander Mormont asks Tyrion to plead with the King to send more recruits to the Night's Watch. Daenerys, now pregnant, stands up to her brother, Viserys, threatening him if he ever abuses her again.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Jon begins his training with the Night's Watch; Ned confronts his past and future at King's Landing; Daenerys finds herself at odds with Viserys.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Ned, a nova Mão do Rei, viaja para Porto Real acompanhado por suas filhas, Sansa e Arya. Catelyn permanece em Winterfell para cuidar do ainda inconsciente Bran. Um assassino ataca Bran, mas Catelyn o afasta e o lobo gigante de Bran, Summer, o mata. Catelyn suspeita que os Lannisters estavam por trás do ataque. O filho ilegítimo de Ned, Jon, segue para o norte com seu tio, Benjen Stark, para se juntar à Patrulha da Noite, os protetores da Muralha, uma enorme estrutura de gelo que mantém as tribos Selvagens e os míticos Caminhantes Brancos da civilizada Westeros. Antes de partir, Jon deu a Arya uma espada fina que ela chama de "Agulha". O irmão mais novo da Rainha Cersei, Tyrion Lannister, um anão também conhecido como "O Diabrete", acompanha Jon à Muralha. Em Porto Real, o príncipe Joffrey ameaça o jovem amigo plebeu de Arya, depois de matá-lo. Nymeria, o lobo gigante de Arya, a defende, mordendo Joffrey. Cersei exige que Robert mate o lobo, mas Arya libera Nymeria na natureza. A loba gigante de Sansa, Lady, é morta. Em Winterfell, Brandon acorda, sem se lembrar de nada sobre sua queda. Enquanto isso, Daenerys faz amizade com Sor Jorah Mormont, um cavaleiro desgraçado, enquanto ela se concentra em aprender a agradar Drogo.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Enquanto Bran se recupera da queda, Ned leva apenas suas filhas para Porto Real. Jon Snow vai com seu tio Benjen à Muralha. Tyrion se junta a eles.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Ned, the new Hand of the King, travels to King's Landing accompanied by his daughters, Sansa and Arya. Catelyn remains at Winterfell to care for the still unconscious Bran. An assassin attacks Bran, but Catelyn fends him off and Bran's direwolf, Summer, kills him. Catelyn suspects the Lannisters were behind the attack. Ned's illegitimate son, Jon, heads north with his uncle, Benjen Stark, to join the Night's Watch, the protectors of the Wall, a massive ice structure that keeps the Wildling tribes and the mythical White Walkers from civilized Westeros. Before departing, Jon gave tomboy Arya a thin sword she names, "Needle". Queen Cersei's younger brother, Tyrion Lannister, a dwarf also known as "The Imp," accompanies Jon to the Wall. In King's Landing, Prince Joffrey threatens Arya's young commoner friend, later having him killed. Nymeria, Arya's direwolf, defends her, biting Joffrey. Cersei demands that Robert have the wolf killed, but Arya releases Nymeria to the wild. Sansa's direwolf, Lady, is killed instead. In Winterfell, Brandon awakens, remembering nothing about his fall. Meanwhile, Daenerys is befriended by Ser Jorah Mormont, a disgraced knight, while she focuses on learning how to please Drogo.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: While Bran recovers from his fall, Ned takes only his daughters to King's Landing. Jon Snow goes with his uncle Benjen to the Wall. Tyrion joins them.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Arya escapa da Fortaleza Vermelha depois que Syrio Forel, seu mestre de espadas bravosiano, afasta os guardas enviados para prendê-la, enquanto Sansa é capturada. Robb ouve a notícia e prepara os exércitos do Norte para lutar contra os Lannisters, deixando Bran para trás para governar Winterfell. Lysa se recusa a lutar contra os Lannisters, e Catelyn sai para se juntar ao acampamento de Robb. Tyrion e Bronn estão cercados por Shagga, líder da tribo Stone Crows. Tyrion os convence a escoltá-lo até seu pai Tywin Lannister, que os pagará. No acampamento, Tywin pede a Shagga para ajudá-los a enfrentar os Starks em troca de um pagamento ainda maior. Na Muralha, alguns corpos afetados pelos Caminhantes Brancos são encontrados. Um desperta como um wight e ataca o Comandante Mormont, mas Jon o mata. Em Essos, os soldados de Drogo começam a atacar assentamentos próximos, escravizando os moradores locais para vendê-los e arrecadar dinheiro para comprar navios para cruzar o Mar Estreito. Drogo é ferido em uma luta. Joffrey nomeia seu avô, Tywin, como Mão do Rei. Sansa implora a Joffrey que mostre misericórdia a Ned. Joffrey concorda se Ned reconhecer publicamente a reivindicação de Joffrey ao trono e admitir ter cometido traição.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Os Lannisters pressionam sua vantagem sobre os Starks; Robb reúne os aliados do norte de seu pai e segue para o sul para a guerra; Os Caminhantes Brancos atacam a Muralha; Tyrion volta para seu pai com alguns novos amigos.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Arya escapes the Red Keep after Syrio Forel, her Braavosian sword master, fends off guards sent to arrest her, while Sansa is captured. Robb hears the news and prepares the Northern armies to fight the Lannisters, leaving Bran behind to rule Winterfell. Lysa refuses to fight the Lannisters, and Catelyn leaves to join Robb's camp. Tyrion and Bronn are surrounded by Shagga, leader of the Stone Crows tribe. Tyrion convinces them to escort him to his father Tywin Lannister, who will pay them. At the camp, Tywin asks Shagga to help them confront the Starks in exchange for even greater payment. At the Wall, some bodies affected by the White Walkers are found. One awakens as a wight and attack Commander Mormont, but Jon kills it. In Essos, Drogo's soldiers begin attacking nearby settlements, enslaving locals in order to sell them to raise money to buy ships to cross the Narrow Sea. Drogo is wounded in a fight. Joffrey appoints his grandfather, Tywin, as Hand of the King. Sansa begs Joffrey to show Ned mercy. Joffrey agrees if Ned publicly recognizes Joffrey's claim to the throne and admits to committing treason.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: The Lannisters press their advantage over the Starks; Robb rallies his father's northern allies and heads south to war; The White Walkers attack the Wall; Tyrion returns to his father with some new friends.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Tywin supervisiona o reforjamento de Gelo, a espada de aço valiriano ancestral da Casa Stark, em duas novas. Um é para Jaime, que lamenta a perda de sua mão de espada e o amor de Cersei, e o outro é um presente de casamento para o Rei Joffrey, que Joffrey chama de Lamento da Viúva. O príncipe Oberyn Martell, representando seu irmão enfermo, o príncipe Doran de Dorne, chega a Porto Real para participar do casamento real. Ele e sua amante, Ellaria Sand, são recebidos por Tyrion. Oberyn secretamente busca vingança contra os Lannister e Gregor Clegane pelo estupro e assassinato de sua irmã, Elia, esposa do infiel Príncipe Rhaegar Targaryen. No Norte, Styr e os canibais Thenns reforçam Tormund, Ygritte e os outros Selvagens. Meistre Aemon absolve Jon depois que ele explica suas ações enquanto estava com os Selvagens e revela que seu exército de 100.000 planeja atacar Castelo Negro. Nas Terras Fluviais, o Cão de Caça e Arya vão para o Ninho da Águia, onde o Cão de Caça pretende resgatar Arya para sua tia Lysa, a viúva de Jon Arryn. Ao longo do caminho, Arya recupera sua espada, Needle, de Polliver, matando-o. Em Essos, Daenerys marcha seu exército em direção a Meereen, a última das três grandes cidades escravas; ela teme estar perdendo o controle sobre seus dragões em crescimento, agora do tamanho de cavalos.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Tyrion recebe um convidado em Porto Real. Em Castelo Negro, Jon é julgado. Daenerys é apontada para Meereen, a mãe de todas as cidades escravas. Arya encontra um velho inimigo.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Tywin oversees the reforging of Ice, House Stark's ancestral Valyrian steel sword, into two new ones. One is for Jaime, who grieves the loss of his sword hand and Cersei's love, and the other is a wedding present for King Joffrey, which Joffrey names Widow's Wail. Prince Oberyn Martell, representing his infirmed brother, Prince Doran of Dorne, arrives in King's Landing to attend the royal wedding. He and his paramour, Ellaria Sand, are greeted by Tyrion. Oberyn secretly seeks revenge against the Lannisters and Gregor Clegane for the rape and murder of his sister, Elia, wife of the unfaithful Prince Rhaegar Targaryen. In the North, Styr and the cannibalistic Thenns reinforce Tormund, Ygritte and the other Wildlings. Maester Aemon absolves Jon after he explains his actions while with the Wildlings and reveals that their army of 100,000 plans to attack Castle Black. In the Riverlands, the Hound and Arya head to the Eyrie where the Hound intends to ransom Arya to her Aunt Lysa, Jon Arryn's widow. Along the way, Arya reclaims her sword, Needle, from Polliver, killing him. In Essos, Daenerys marches her army towards Meereen, the last of the three great slave cities; she fears she is losing control over her growing dragons, now horse-sized.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Tyrion welcomes a guest to King's Landing. At Castle Black, Jon stands trial. Daenerys is pointed to Meereen, the mother of all slave cities. Arya runs into an old enemy.
